name: Nothing Personnel Kid
description: Make the next player draw 2 more cards (stackable).

name: Freak You, Specifically
description: Make the next player draw 4 more cards (stackable).

name: The Captain Sink with The Ship
description: Make the last player draw the same amount of cards as you.

name: You’re Going Nowhere
description: Make the player with the lowest number of cards draw 2 more cards.

name: You’re Going Nowhere
description: Make the player with the lowest number of cards draw 2 more cards.

name: No, You!
description: Reflect the action onto the next person.
